website_summaries.verdict: Pro and Air 2 owners can skip this one, but for nearly everyone else, the updated iPad is an ideal all-around tablet at a fantastic price.
pros: Apple's new iPad delivers faster performance and a brighter screen than the model it replaces, at a price that's about half as much as the iPad Pro
Tight integration between the hardware, software and app store makes it easy to use
cons: It's a bit thicker and heavier than the now defunct iPad Air 2
It lacks the stylus support, better speakers and better screen of the iPad Pro
